item.title: Green netting on tree, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: 4 Red Barracks Road, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping, 26th August
item.description:
My report I created yesterday was updated today as fixed. It definitely is not - photos attached. We need a long term solution - itâ€™s unhygienic and out of hand. We pay service charge and council tax, why should we have to put up with this?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Terraced house made into 6 tiny flats, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Wooden planks on bridge are loose, 26th August
item.description:
Loose wooden planks creating a trip hazard and excessive noise. Reported a couple of days ago, and Greenwich council have now reported as fixed. Either nothing was done or just one of the planks pushed back into position (which is not successful fix), I saw a young child fall off their scooter today. Noise makes sleeping very difficult. This needs a proper fix.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mast Quay, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet
